name: JSC "Inter RAO UES" Representative office in the territory of the Kingdom of Belgium
bossPosition: Director of the JSC "Inter RAO UES" Representative office
goal: Representation of the JSC "Inter RAO UES" activities, projects, etc. in goverment and nongoverment regulatory authorities of the European Union, in particular: the European Parliament, the European Comission, the European Council, the Secretariat of the Benelux Countries and the Western European Union and other relevant international organisation
interests: Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Energy policy of EU, initiatives and plans of development of energy markets of EU members
